welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Belvidere, where small town charm meets big city amenities! Known for its breathtaking scenery and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Rockford Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Rockford Airport is equipped to handle a wide range of cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock County Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Rock County Airport caters to private and charter flights and offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers.
